# CACHE LPLMEM

## [2.1.2]

- Improvements
  - Add memory barrier when enabling/disabling cache.

## [2.1.1]

- Bug Fixes
  - MISRA C-2012 issue fixed: rule 10.4.

## [2.1.0]

- Bug Fixes
  - Deleted L1CACHE_EnableCodeCacheWriteBuffer function because of no enable bit in register CPCR2.

## [2.0.0]

- Initial version.
